[![](http://www.sharknode.com/images/logo.png)](http://www.sharknode.com)

Hello everyone at LET!  
This is Jonathan from SharkNode and I'm here to announce the launch of our new Xen VPS line in Dallas, TX. We have multiple servers from Incero and are looking to fill the lack of Xen-based VPS providers around here!  

**About Us:**  
Let's face it. SharkNode is a smaller provider. We don't have massive funds to provide you with instantaneous 24/7 Live Support. We don't have thousands of dollars to spend on affiliate marketing. We don't have hundreds of servers and millions of customers. However, what we do have is quality. Our philosophy is that quality is always better than quantity. We don't care how many clients we have, each and every one will receive personal support from our team, and if that means hiring another employee simply to ensure each customer has an assigned representative, that's exactly what will happen. 

SharkNode was founded with only quality in mind. It was started in 2013 as a private business based in Malibu that created websites for personal clients and hosted them on a reseller account. However, we feel that it's time to grow and reach out to public markets. We have moved on from reselling and now lease our own top-notch dedicated hardware. We have recently added a VPS line as well, and we are ready to serve you.

**Our Features:**

   * No Overselling. Period. We carefully calculated all the available RAM and disk space in order to provision all clients WITHOUT overselling.
   * Quality Support. You don't like BS and neither do we. You don't get the 24/7 instant response times you might expect from a large provider, but you can be sure you will get a REAL answer within a reasonable timeframe.
   * Instant Provisioning. With rare exceptions, your server will be instantly created and details will be emailed to you after payment.
   * SolusVM. Use the powerful and tested panel to manage your VPS. 
   * Terms of Service : Please refer to [Incero's ToS](http://incero.com/terms-of-service) for details of our AUP/ToS while we update ours to reflect our new Xen offerings. Incero's ToS only applies to our Xen offerings. If you have any doubts about whether your VPS use will be acceptable or not, please submit a ticket and contact us. That will be the best way to ensure that both parties are satisfied. **SPAM IS ABSOLUTELY NOT TOLERATED. ANY VPS FOUND SENDING SPAM (yes, it's monitored) WILL BE IMMEDIATELY SUSPENDED AND CLIENT INFORMATION WILL BE REPORTED TO PROPER CHANNELS**

----------
